title: Homemade Presents Communal Table: Timothy Hollingsworth Talks About Kitchen Intensity, Belonging, and Cooking for Your Mom
description:
While we are busy recording new episodes of Homemade, check out this episode of Communal Table. Chefs and restaurant workers take great care of everyone else, but often they need a little help themselves. Each week on the Communal Table podcast, Food & Wine’s senior editor Kat Kinsman talks with hospitality pros about how they manage their business, brain, and body for the long haul.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Allrecipes
